snippet: BEGUN--Martin S. JBI International, Inc. (established in 1931 as The Jewish Braille Institute) mourns the passing of its Trustee and good friend Martin S. Begun. Our condolences to his wife, family and many friends. He will be missed. May his memory serve as a blessing. Judy E. Tenney, Co-Chairman of the Board Steven P. Polivy, Co-Chairman of the Board Dr. Ellen Isler, President & CEO Israel A. Taub, Vice President & CFO 1/3
lead_paragraph: BEGUN--Martin S. JBI International, Inc. (established in 1931 as The Jewish Braille Institute) mourns the passing of its Trustee and good friend Martin S. Begun. Our condolences to his wife, family and many friends. He will be missed. May his memory serve as a blessing. Judy E. Tenney, Co-Chairman of the Board Steven P. Polivy, Co-Chairman of the Board Dr. Ellen Isler, President & CEO Israel A. Taub, Vice President & CFO 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BEGUN, MARTIN S
